name: Craft Academy
title: Junior Software Developer
description: 16 week software development bootcamp featuring a full stack curriculum including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Ruby, Rails and more. Focused on teaching devs to utilize a test-driven approach to development, using tools such as RSpec, Node, Cucumber and Cypress.  Heavy focus on collaboration and pair-programming - each week features a new project/problem set to complete with 60+hour workload full of live demos, coding sessions and real-world client/app interaction. See more here: https://www.craftacademy.se/

name: Asylum Entertainment
title: Line Producer
description: Managed multi-million dollar budget for Facebook’s “Big Chicken Shaq” featuring Shaquille O’Neal, in addition to PMing daily shoots on location in Las Vegas. See more here: https://www.facebook.com/bigchickenshaqshow/

name: A&E
title: Production Manager
description: A&E’s “Autobiography” series shot on location in various major US cities following the trials and tribulations of various athletes, public figures and celebrities as told through their own voices. Also produced casting, locations & logistics for recreation shoots. See more here: https://www.aetv.com/shows/elizabeth-smart-autobiography
